shadow.name: REACTION
shadow.description: Emotional rejection without discernment, burning bridges
shadow.behavioral_signature: Impulsive rejection, cutting people off reactively
shadow.somatic_signature: Hot solar plexus, explosive rejection energy
shadow.thought_pattern: This is wrong. I need to reject this immediately.

gift.name: REVOLUTION
gift.description: Sacred 'no' that honors principles and timing
gift.thought_pattern: This is not for me. My no is sacred.

siddhi.name: REBIRTH
siddhi.description: Transformation through release, death enabling new life
siddhi.behavioral_signature: Graceful endings, composting the old into new
siddhi.thought_pattern: Every ending is a beginning. I release with reverence.

inversion_protocols.script: You are rejecting from an emotional wave, not from clarity. Gate 49 is the divorce gateâ€”it knows when something needs to end. But true rejection requires emotional clarity, which comes after the wave completes. Wait 72 hours before making any rejection permanent. Many rejections will soften with time.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel the rejection impulse. Notice it's hot and reactive. Wait. Let the wave pass. Then decide.

experiment.hypothesis: If I wait 72 hours before making rejection permanent, I'll make better decisions.
experiment.action: When feeling rejection, write it down. Wait 72 hours. Reassess. Notice how many rejections soften.

success_criteria.target: Fewer impulsive rejections, more sustainable boundaries
